AND so.num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockOut.num},'%')
AND so.custodian LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockOut.custodian},'%')
AND so.handler LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockOut.handler},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockOut.userName},'%')
